name: shape cut
desc: shape cut will map the distance from the edges of a set shape to the nodes of the input field.

properties.name: Shape Type
properties.desc: The ShapeType allows the user to select the type of shape to generate data from.

properties.name: X Center
properties.desc: The X Center is the x center of the shape to be generated.

properties.name: Y Center
properties.desc: The Y Center is the y center of the shape to be generated.

properties.name: Z Center
properties.desc: The Z Center is the z center of the shape to be generated.

properties.name: Z Height
properties.desc: The height of the shape to be generated can be set using this control.

properties.name: Cylinder Radius
properties.desc: If Shape Type is set to Cylindrical the radius of the cylinder can be set using this control.

properties.name: X Width
properties.desc: If Shape Type is set to Rectangular the width of the rectangle can be set using this control.

properties.name: Y Length
properties.desc: If Shape Type is set to Rectangular the length of the rectangle can be set using this control.

properties.name: Rectangular Rotation
properties.desc: If Shape Type is set to Rectangular the rotation about the center of the rectangle can be set using this control.

properties.name: Cylinder Height
properties.desc: If Shape Type is set to Cylindrical the height of the cylinder can be set using this control.
